modalContent: Showing emptathy and supporting teachers and students with difficult tasks
Led team planning of digital technology curriculum and assemblies
Planning and building user-friendly, modern user-interfaces with React
Utilizing popular front-end technolgies such as NextJs, Tailwind, Boostrap and React-Native
Comfortable engaging in conversations and managing day-to-day tasks
Ability to comprehend articles, novels and song lyrics in Mandarin
Identifying and solving real world problems with Python, Javascript and PHP
solving puzzles and challenges - using platforms such as Chess, Codewars & CSSBatle
Communicating instructions, advice and suggestions clearly and confidently
Actively listening to collegues, customers and students problems to find effective solutions
plan, coordinate and discuss ideas with collegues on key projects
Praising collegues' and students' positive work and giving constructive feedback when appropiate
